mapper.select: select count(*) from t_board where board_no = board_ref

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, N.* FROM (SELECT B.BOARD_NO BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_REF BOARD_REF, B.TRASH_NO TRASH_NO, B.USER_NO USER_NO, B.BOARD_CONTENT BOARD_CONTENT, B.HASHTAG HASHTAG, B.BOARD_READCOUNT BOARD_READCOUNT, B.BOARD_DATE BOARD_DATE, T.TRASH_PATH TRASH_PATH, U.USER_NAME USER_NAME FROM T_BOARD B LEFT JOIN T_TRASH T ON T.TRASH_NO = B.TRASH_NO LEFT JOIN T_USER U ON U.USER_NO = T.USER_NO WHERE BOARD_NO = BOARD_REF ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) N) WHERE RNUM >= #{ startRow } AND RNUM <= #{ endRow }

SELECT B.BOARD_NO BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_REF BOARD_REF, B.TRASH_NO TRASH_NO, B.USER_NO USER_NO, B.BOARD_CONTENT BOARD_CONTENT, B.HASHTAG HASHTAG, B.BOARD_READCOUNT BOARD_READCOUNT, B.BOARD_DATE BOARD_DATE, T.TRASH_PATH TRASH_PATH, U.USER_NAME USER_NAME FROM T_BOARD B LEFT JOIN T_TRASH T ON T.TRASH_NO = B.TRASH_NO LEFT JOIN T_USER U ON U.USER_NO = T.USER_NO WHERE BOARD_NO = #{ board_no }

SELECT B.BOARD_NO BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_REF BOARD_REF, B.TRASH_NO TRASH_NO, B.USER_NO USER_NO, B.BOARD_CONTENT BOARD_CONTENT, B.HASHTAG HASHTAG, B.BOARD_READCOUNT BOARD_READCOUNT, B.BOARD_DATE BOARD_DATE, T.TRASH_PATH TRASH_PATH, U.USER_NAME USER_NAME FROM T_BOARD B LEFT JOIN T_TRASH T ON T.TRASH_NO = B.TRASH_NO LEFT JOIN T_USER U ON U.USER_NO = B.USER_NO WHERE BOARD_NO <> BOARD_REF AND BOARD_REF = #{board_no} ORDER BY BOARD_NO ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO <> BOARD_REF AND BOARD_REF = #{board_no}
